pageBanner.title: About Us
pageBanner.subtitle: Accompanying you on your career journey

Gioi_thieu.PATHWAY_Story_Description: PATHWAY was founded in 2018 by leading HR professionals with the mission of helping Vietnamese workers shape and develop sustainable careers in the digital age.
Gioi_thieu.PATHWAY_Story_Detail: From the first consultations, we realized that many talented people were having difficulty expressing their value to employers and developing a clear career path.
Gioi_thieu.PATHWAY_Story_Mission: Over the past 5 years, PATHWAY has accompanied more than 5,000 clients from fresh graduates to senior managers, helping them achieve their career goals and build sustainable careers.

missionCard.title: Mission
missionCard.description: “Pathway CV supports users to create, manage, and upgrade personal profiles to serve career orientation.”
missionCard.listItem1: “Create, manage and upgrade profiles”: Not only stopping at providing CV templates, the project aims at a long-term personal profile management ecosystem, allowing users to update and adjust according to each career stage.
missionCard.listItem2: “Career Orientation Service”: This is not simply writing a CV to apply for a job, but supporting users to clearly see themselves, shape their career path, and thereby express it strategically.
missionCard.listItem3: Not simply a CV creation tool, but a strategic partner that helps users reflect their personal development journey through their profile, with an educational and liberating goal.

visionCard.title: Vision
visionCard.description: “To become the leading career profile personalization platform in Vietnam for young people and working people.”
visionCard.listItem1: “Career profile personalization platform”: Not a mass product, but focusing on customization according to the journey, goals, and profession of each user.
visionCard.listItem2: “Leading in Vietnam”: Ambition to take the leading position in this niche market – requiring not only good technology, but also a deep understanding of Vietnamese users.
visionCard.listItem3: “Young people and working people”: Clearly define the target group: from students to experienced people – who have very different needs but all need specialized support, suitable for personal development trends.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: A team of experienced experts in recruitment and career development, providing practical perspectives and clear direction to clients.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Committed to providing high-quality, personalized, and optimized services according to each user's career goals.

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description: Understand the difficulties in the career journey and accompany customers through practical, sincere advice.

results.title: Results
results.description: With results at the center, Pathway focuses on specific goals, helping clients achieve clear and sustainable achievements in their careers.

stage1.title: Building the foundation & developing core services

stage3.title: Affirming position through scale & enhancing value through training

teamSection.title: Team of experts – The foundation of difference at PATHWAY
teamSection.description: The PATHWAY team gathers experienced experts with deep expertise and understanding of the recruitment market as well as the career development journey of Vietnamese people. Each individual plays a strategic role in PATHWAY's comprehensive service ecosystem.

member1.name: Nguyen Thi Minh
member1.bio: With more than 15 years of experience in the field of recruitment and human resource training, Ms. Minh is the founder and main operator, the one who inspires, builds a humane, practical, and results-oriented corporate culture, guaranteeing the long-term vision and consistent service quality.

member2.name: Tran Duc Anh
member2.bio: Formerly a consultant at multinational companies, Mr. Duc Anh brings a modern and logical perspective to career building, applying coaching methods to help clients understand themselves deeply and become more self-motivated in the long-term orientation.

member3.name: La Hoang Mai
member3.bio: Ms. Hoang Mai directly helps clients upgrade their personal profiles to conquer employers. Her sharp content editing skills have helped double the client's interview response rate.

member4.name: Pham Van Tuan
member4.bio: Having held the position of recruiting manager at Fortune 500 corporations, Mr. Tuan coaches clients in a direct and practical way from an employer's perspective, helping them overcome difficult selection rounds with solid preparation and confidence.

ourPartnersSection.title: Our Partners
ourPartnersSection.description: One of the clearest pieces of evidence of PATHWAY's reputation and capacity is the system of partners that this organization cooperates with, including global technology "giants".

achievement1.title: Top 10 Career Consulting Units 2022
achievement1.description: Voted by the Ho Chi Minh City Business Association, this title is a testament to the quality of service, market reputation, and practical effectiveness of PATHWAY in supporting career orientation for young people.

achievement2.title: Outstanding Startup 2021 – Vietnam Startup Award
achievement2.description: The award from VnExpress affirms that PATHWAY is not only good at expertise, but also possesses innovative startup thinking, with a business model with social value and potential for expansion.

achievement3.title: Community Enterprise 2023
achievement3.description: This title emphasizes PATHWAY's social responsibility through organizing free training activities for students, demonstrating a vision of sustainable development.

program1.imageAlt: Image of a workshop for students
program1.title: Workshops for students
program1.description: Organizing more than 50 free workshops at universities nationwide, popularizing career knowledge, and preparing necessary soft skills and career thinking for students before entering the labor market.

program2.imageAlt: Image of the PATHWAY Scholarship program
program2.title: PATHWAY Scholarship
program2.description: Offering 20 scholarships per year for students in difficult circumstances, including training courses and internship opportunities at partner units, opening career doors.

program3.imageAlt: Image of career guidance program in remote areas
program3.title: Career guidance in remote areas
program3.description: Providing free career counseling for students in remote areas, demonstrating the spirit of enlightenment and equal opportunity, ensuring no one is left behind in the journey of discovering and building the future.

ctaSection.title: Join PATHWAY
ctaSection.description: Whether you are looking for a new career direction or want to enhance your professional standing, the PATHWAY team is always ready to accompany and support you.

hero.subTitle: CV Review, Job Search Strategy, Career Consulting
hero.tagline: Over 1000+ Professionals have advanced their careers with our support

introduction.title: Your Career Journey Starts Here
introduction.paragraph: PATHWAY is a leading provider of CV optimization and job search strategy services. We pride ourselves on offering comprehensive support to professionals at all career stages. Our team includes career consultants, HR specialists, and industry insiders who combine deep expertise in resume writing with creative thinking in personal branding.
introduction.card1_description: Empowering professionals with the tools, strategies, and confidence needed to stand out in a competitive job market and achieve their career goals.
introduction.card2_description: To be the leading career services provider, transforming how people approach job searching, creating a world where everyone can reach their full career potential.
introduction.card3_description: We believe in customized solutions that emphasize each individual's unique value. Data-driven strategies and personalized consultations create meaningful career breakthroughs.

ourDistinctMissionSection.title: OUR MISSION
ourDistinctMissionSection.item1_text: Spreading the brand values of organizations and businesses to the community.
ourDistinctMissionSection.item2_text: Increasing customer awareness, trust, and preference for Products/Services.
ourDistinctMissionSection.item3_text: Orienting the market with advertising trends according to international standards.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.paragraph1: PATHWAY combines expertise in CV writing, interview coaching, and career strategy. We are committed to providing personalized support to professionals at all levels.
whyChooseUs.paragraph2: With over 15 years of experience, our team has helped professionals secure positions at top companies such as Google, Microsoft, Amazon, Meta, Goldman Sachs, McKinsey, Deloitte, and many other Fortune 500 organizations across all industries and roles.

servicesSection.title: Our Services
servicesSection.service1_description: Receive detailed feedback and editing suggestions to make your CV stand out.
servicesSection.service2_description: Improve your LinkedIn profile to attract recruiters and job opportunities.
servicesSection.service3_description: Practice interviewing with experts to confidently apply for your dream position.

testimonialSection.title: WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY ABOUT PATHWAY?
testimonialSection.card1_quote: “With PATHWAY's professional support, my CV was significantly improved. The experts helped me identify my strengths and present information effectively. As a result, I received more interview invitations and ultimately landed my dream position at a top company.”

overview.title: Comprehensive Solutions for Your Career
overview.description: PATHWAY offers professional career consulting services tailored for each stage of development. From fresh graduates to senior experts, we accompany you on your career path.

serviceList.title: Our Services
serviceList.description: Discover professional services designed to help you achieve your career goals

service1.title: In-depth CV Review
service1.description: Your CV reviewed and edited by recruitment experts to optimize your interview chances.
service1.feature1: Detailed analysis of strengths and weaknesses

service2.title: Interview & Orientation Consulting
service2.description: Prepare effective interview skills and strategies, increasing your success rate with employers.

service3.title: Personal Branding
service3.description: Build a professional and outstanding image in the job market and on online platforms.

service4.title: Soft Skills Training
service4.description: Develop essential skills to help you excel in the modern work environment.

process.title: Our Working Process
process.description: We follow a professional process to ensure maximum efficiency

step1.title: Initial Consultation
step1.description: Analyze your needs and career goals to propose the most suitable solution

step2.title: Plan Development
step2.description: Design a detailed roadmap and action plan based on your specific situation

step3.title: Service Implementation
step3.description: Deploy consulting, training, and support activities according to the agreed plan

step4.title: Monitoring & Evaluation
step4.description: Measure results and adjust strategies to ensure achievement of set goals

testimonial1.name: Nguyen Thanh Ha
testimonial1.content: PATHWAY's CV review service significantly improved my resume. Within just 2 weeks, I received multiple interview invitations from top companies.

testimonial2.name: Tran Minh Duc
testimonial2.content: The mock interview consultation boosted my confidence immensely. The coach's analysis of my strengths and weaknesses, along with their advice, was very practical and effective.

testimonial3.name: Le Thi Phuong
testimonial3.content: I took the personal branding course and saw a clear change in how recruiters perceived my profile. Worth every penny!

pricing.title: Service Pricing
pricing.description: We offer flexible service packages to suit all needs and budgets
pricing.contactForQuoteMessage: Please contact us for a detailed quote

cta.title: Ready to Elevate Your Career?
cta.description: Schedule a free 15-minute consultation with a PATHWAY expert today to find the best solution for your career goals.

item1.question: What do I get from the CV review service?
item1.answer: You will receive a detailed evaluation report on the strengths and weaknesses of your current CV, along with specific suggestions to improve content, structure, and formatting. Depending on the service package, you may also receive a CV edited by an expert and a 1-on-1 consultation session.

item2.question: How does the mock interview consultation work?
item2.answer: The mock interview consultation includes a simulated interview based on the position you are applying for. Afterward, the expert will assess and provide detailed feedback on your answers, body language, communication skills, and specific improvement suggestions.

item3.question: Who is the personal branding service for?
item3.answer: This service is suitable for both new professionals looking to build a professional image and senior experts wanting to enhance their industry standing. We will customize the strategy to fit your experience level and specific goals.

item4.question: Can I request consultation for a specific industry?
item4.answer: Yes, PATHWAY's consulting team has experience in various fields such as IT, finance, marketing, engineering, etc. We will connect you with an expert experienced in your industry to ensure relevant and practical advice.
